ofx:section.ofx:title: Raspberry Debian Linux
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Download Raspbian from http://www.raspberrypi.org/downloads/ Download UNetbootin http://unetbootin.sourceforge.net

ofx:section.ofx:title: OSX
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Identify the dsik with "diskutil" sudo dd bs=1m if=/path/to/iso.img of=/dev/rdiskX sudo diskutil eject /dev/rdiskXX
